about_the_game:
Run n Jump your way to the top in this action platformer. Navigate through obstacles using precise movement as you race to save the lost maiden at the top.

Game Features

  • Fast paced action platformer.
  • 2 challenging levels to test your skills on.
  • Cosmetic upgrades when you complete a level.
  • Addictive gameplay to keep running for hours.
  • Music to help you achieve greatness.
detailed_description:
Run n Jump your way to the top in this action platformer. Navigate through obstacles using precise movement as you race to save the lost maiden at the top.

  • 2 challenging levels to test your skills on.
  • Cosmetic upgrades when you complete a level.
  • Addictive gameplay to keep running for hours.
  • Music to help you achieve greatness.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520

short_description: Run n Jump your way through dangerous obstacles to save the lost maiden at the top. Find yourself dropped into a treacherous world running full speed while trying to avoid being massacred by the obstacles in your way. Do you have the skill to rescue the lost maiden?
supported_languages:
English*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
